data.name: Introduction.Title
data.value: Site Configuration Wizard

data.name: Introduction.Help
data.value: The Site Configuration Wizard provides Administrators with a user-friendly way to set up the most common features of a site. You can step through the Wizard using the Next/Back buttons at the bottom of the Wizard Page. Once enough detail has been collected to complete the Wizard, the Finish Button will be enabled.

data.name: Template.Title
data.value: Choose a Template for your site

data.name: Template.Help
data.value: You can optionally choose to build your site from a pre-existing template. To choose a template click the check box to enable the list of templates, and choose a template from the list. If you choose to build your site using a template, you must decide how to handle duplicate modules. These are module that are in the Template and are already on your site.

data.name: lblMergeModule.Help
data.value: Choose how to duplicate modules with be handled: "Ignore" will place a copy of any duplicated modules on the same page; "Replace" will delete the existing content and replace it with the template content; or merge to combine the content.

data.name: Ignore.Text
data.value: Ignore

data.name: Replace.Text
data.value: Replace

data.name: Merge.Text
data.value: Merge

data.name: MergeWarning.Text
data.value: Note: If you choose "Replace", all existing content on pages that are also in the template will be lost.

data.name: TemplateRequired.Text
data.value: You must select a template before you can proceed.

data.name: InvalidTemplate.Text
data.value: {0} is not a valid site template file.

data.name: Skin.Title
data.value: Select a Theme for Your Site

data.name: Skin.Help
data.value: You can select a Theme from the Theme Viewer (below). This theme will be applied to all pages in your site. However, when you edit the Page properties you will have the ability to override this default theme with a different one.

data.name: Container.Title
data.value: Choose a Default Container for Your Site

data.name: Container.Help
data.value: You can select a Container from the Container Viewer. This container will be applied to all modules on all pages in your site. However, when you edit the Module properties you will have the ability to override this default container with a different one.

data.name: IncludeAll.Text
data.value: Show All Containers:

data.name: Details.Title
data.value: Add Site Details

data.name: Details.Help
data.value:
On this page you can provide some basic information about your site. You can optionally provide a Description and Keywords that help describe your site. These are used by search engines, together with the site's name to help identify and index your site. The keywords need to be separated by commas.

Some themes support a Logo, usually displayed in the top left hand corner. If you are using a theme that supports logos you can choose it on this page. If the file you would like is not on this site, you can upload one from your local computer.

data.name: lblPortalName.Text
data.value: Name/Title:

data.name: lblPortalName.Help
data.value: The site name will display in the TitleBar of the browser.

data.name: lblDescription.Text
data.value: Description:

data.name: lblDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for your site.

data.name: lblKeyWords.Text
data.value: Keywords:

data.name: lblKeyWords.Help
data.value: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by a comma).

data.name: lblLogo.Text
data.value: Logo:

data.name: lblLogo.Help
data.value: Select or upload a logo.

data.name: Complete.Title
data.value: Site Configuration Completed

data.name: Complete.Help
data.value:
Your Site has been successfully configured.

If you changed the theme for your site, it should change when you leave this page.

data.name: ControlTitle_.Text
data.value: Site Wizard

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Site Wizard

The Administrator can use this user-friendly wizard to set up the common features of the Website.

data.name: Finish.Text
data.value: Finish

data.name: Next.Text
data.value: Next

data.name: Previous.Text
data.value: Previous

data.name: EditOnly.Text
data.value: This module is only available for users who have been given Edit permission. Please contact the Site Administrator if you think you should have this permission.

data.name: lblMergeModule.Text
data.value: How to Deal With Duplicate Modules

data.name: lblTemplateList.Help
data.value: You can select a template which you want to build the site with.

data.name: lblTemplateList.Text
data.value: Template List

data.name: lblTemplateMessage.Help
data.value: If you want to rebuild your site with a template, please select this checkbox.

data.name: lblTemplateMessage.Text
data.value: Build Your Site From a Template
